content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good afternoon, Maria. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. What rental price range are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest price possible. So, I can afford to pay the rent.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand. The rental price for the apartment is negotiable, and I am willing to work with you to find a mutually agreeable price. What is your budget for the monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 1000 Euros.

I am also very responsible and dependable, so I will definitely pay the rent on time.

I would like to maintain a good relationship with the landlord, so I am willing to negotiate. Please let me know your proposal.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your understanding, Maria. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe a rental price of 1200 Euros per month would be fair. However, I am open to discussing a lower price if you are willing to sign a longer lease agreement. What are your thoughts on this proposal?
name: Heinrich Heine
